page.title: 01LANDSCAPE AND BUILDINGS
page.content: IN OUR DESIGNATED AREA WHICH IS MAINLY GOOD PRODUCTIVE AGRICULTURAL LAND THERE ARE 24 FARMS VARYING IN SIZE FROM 20 ACRES TO 670 ACRES.THE AVERAGE SIZE OF THE MAJORITY OF FARMS IS 150 ACRES.THESE ARE GENERALLY MIXED FARMS. THERE ARE 3 AREAS OF RESIDENTIAL DEVELOPMENT,THE VILLAGE OF MARHAMCHURCH WITH 1,000 POPULATION, WIDEMOUTH WITH 500 POPULATION AND UPTON WITH 60 POPULATION.THE MOST NOTABLE BUILDINGS IN THE AREA ARE THE CHURCH OF MARHAMCHURCH,A SMALL CHURCH AT WIDEMOUTH AND THE BRAY INSTITUTE- VILLAGE HALL AT MARHAMCHURCH. INCLUDED IN OUR AREA IS THE UNDERGROUND BRITISH TELECOM REPEATER STATION AT WIDEMOUTH BAY WHICH MONITORS TRANSATLANTIC TELEPHONE CALLS.
